A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Overall I thought that Star Wars: The Last Jedi was an enjoyable movie. I was highly entertained and can honestly say I liked it a lot. I will say though that some of the plot that I felt like needed an answer from the The Force Awakens was tossed out as if it never had a role in the movies to begin with. Also this particular episode seemed to be even more lighthearted and cheesy which isn't always a good thing. Overal great movie. Excited to see where they take it next!
